home.text: Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can’t.
home.author: Jerry Rice

home.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
home.author: Unknown

home.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then is not an act but a habit.
home.author: Aristotle

about.text: No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch.
about.author: Unknown

about.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
about.author: Wayne Gretzky

services.text: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
services.author: Tommy Lasorda

services.text: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
services.author: Thomas Jefferson

services.text: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.
services.author: Steve Prefontaine

prices.text: You’re only one workout away from a good mood.
prices.author: Unknown

prices.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
prices.author: Maya Angelou

prices.text: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
prices.author: Unknown

transformations.text: I’ve missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times I’ve been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
transformations.author: Michael Jordan

transformations.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
transformations.author: Mahatma Gandhi

transformations.text: The difference between try and triumph is a little ‘umph’.
transformations.author: Unknown

contact.text: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion. That’s what most people lack, having the guts to go on and just say they’ll go through the pain no matter what happens.
contact.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

contact.text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
contact.author: Muhammad Ali

contact.text: Making excuses burns zero calories per hour.
contact.author: Unknown
